content: to join ch3 36dc 2 round 4 1dc in the next 4dc 2dc in the next double_crochet *1dc in the next 5dc 2dc in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join ch3 42dc rnds 5-8 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to join ch3 48dc round 9 1sc in each single_crochet around slip_stitch to join fasten_off gold round 10 with h hook and coffee attach yarn to where you fastened off 1sc in same st as joining 1sc in each single_crochet around slip_stitch to join fasten_off and weave in ends tuff of hair with h hook and coffee yarn attach to top of row 1 on top of hat chain 6 single_crochet in top of hat chain 6 single_crochet in same stitch as first one chain 6 single_crochet in next stitch on top of hat repeat this all the way around on round one working as many chain loops as desired until you get a cute little group of hair fasten_off and tie in ends inside of ears-make 2 with h hook and coffee chain 6 1sc in 2nd chain from hook 1hdc in next chain double_crochet in the next 2 chs 3dc in last chain now working on opposite side of chain double_crochet in next 2 chs half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain fasten_off outside of ears-make 2 with h hook and gold chain 6 1sc in 2nd chain from hook 1hdc in next double_crochet in the next 2 chs 3dc in last chain now working on opposite side of chain double_crochet in next 2 chs half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain fold the ear in half and work 1sc in next 2ends of row on bottom of ear do not fasten_off now place coffee inside of ear to the gold part working thru both thickness single_crochet decrease the brown ear to the gold ear working 2sc in the 3dc that are on the tip of the ear fasten_off leaving a tail to sew with attach ears to top of hat as shown in pictures horns-make 2 with h hook and warm brown chain 8 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain slip_stitch in the rest of the chains fasten_off leaving a tail to sew with attach horn in between hair and ears spots-make as many as desired round 1 with h hook and coffee chain 2 6sc in 2nd chain from hook 6sc round 2 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc round 3 2sc in each single_crochet around 24sc make various dots sizes using this as a guide to make smaller dots just do round 1 or go up to round 2 © copyrighted sandy s cape cod
